OrgName.entry: CATHEDRAL CHURCH OF ST PETER AND ST PAUL

Desc.entry: Anglican Cathedral. Prayer and worship throughout the week, open to everyone.

ProvisionPlace.entry: Cathedral Church of St Peter and St Paul

ProvisionDaysAndTimes.entry: Sunday Services at 8am (Holy Communion), 9.45am (Morning Prayer), 10.30am (Sung Eucharist), 6.30pm (Evensong/Evening Prayer); Mon & Fri 8.45am (Morning Prayer), 12.30pm (Holy Communion), 4.30pm (Evening Prayer), 5.45pm (Evensong, term-time only); Wed at 10.30am (Holy Communion); Sat at 10am (Morning Prayer), 10.30am (Holy Communion), 3pm (Evening Prayer)
